mapper.select: SELECT b.id deptId,date(create_time)date,b.name deptName,dept_id ,sum(open_account_num)openAccountNum,ifnull(sum(sign_org_num),0)signOrgNum,sum(in_cash)inCash,sum(out_cash)outCash, sum(manage_fund)manageFund,sum(manage_growth_fund)manageGrowthFund,sum(maker_fund)makerFund from follow_up_log a left join( SELECT name,id from department )b on b.id=a.dept_id WHERE 1=1 and a.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP by b.id

SELECT dept_id,date,deptName,sum(openAccountNum)openAccountNum,sum(signOrgNum)signOrgNum, sum(inCash)inCash,sum(outCash)outCash,sum(manage_fund)manageFund, sum(manage_growth_fund)manageGrowthFund,sum(maker_fund)makerFund from ( SELECT dept_id,b.name deptName,date(create_time)date,sum(open_account_num)openAccountNum,sum(ifnull(sign_org_num,0))signOrgNum, sum(in_cash)inCash,sum(out_cash)outCash,manage_fund,manage_growth_fund,maker_fund from follow_up_log a left join( SELECT name,id from department )b on b.id=a.dept_id left join ( SELECT name,id from follow_up )c on c.id =a.follow_id WHERE 1=1 and a.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY c.id order by create_time desc )t GROUP by dept_id order by date desc
